com.gensym.dlg
Interface StandardDialogValidator

public interface StandardDialogValidator

An interface for notifications of command events generated by the buttons on a StandardDialog. Implementations of this interface are responsible for validating the contents of the StandardDialog passed to them for the command code. If any validator returns false, the StandardDialogClient will not be informed of the event, and the dialog will not be dismissed.

Method Summary
 boolean isDialogValid(StandardDialog dlg, int cmdCode)
          The method that is called when a command button on a StandardDialog is activated by the user
